Content:
It's Monday evening at 11 pm and we are about to go to war!
I big snow storm is about to start. It's expected to last through
Tuesday afternoon. Latest prediction is for 9 to 12 inches here
in the hills where I am.
And it's the worst kind....
HEAVY WET MUSH!!
Arrggghhh!
There won't be any motorcycle riding here for a while.
I've got my garden tractor with plow ready, but it may not
do any good against this stuff. It's like plowing heavy wet concrete.
